mapper.select: SELECT P.MATCH_PREDICT_NO,G.GAME_NO,P.MATCH_PREDICT_DECISION,M.MEMBER_ID,G.TEAM_A,G.TEAM_B,G.GAME_TIME,G.GAME_DATE,G.REG_DATE FROM GAME G LEFT JOIN MATCH_PREDICT P ON G.GAME_NO = P.GAME_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID
SELECT M.MEMBER_ID,M.MEMBER_NAME,M.MEMBER_NICKNAME,U.EXPERIENCE_POINTS,U.RANK_POSITION FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN USER_RANK U ON M.MEMBER_ID = U.MEMBER_ID

SELECT G.GAME_NO,G.GAME_DATE,G.GAME_TIME,G.TEAM_A,G.TEAM_B,P.MATCH_PREDICT_DECISION,M.MEMBER_ID FROM MATCH_PREDICT P LEFT JOIN GAME G ON P.GAME_NO = G.GAME_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE P.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT U.MEMBER_ID,M.MEMBER_NICKNAME,M.MEMBER_NAME,U.RANK_POSITION,U.EXPERIENCE_POINTS FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN USER_RANK U ON M.MEMBER_ID = U.MEMBER_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT RANK_POSITION FROM USER_RANK WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT * FROM GAME WHERE GAME_DATE = CURDATE()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MATCH_PREDICT (GAME_NO,MEMBER_ID,MATCH_PREDICT_NO, MATCH_PREDICT_DECISION, REG_DATE) VALUES (#{gameNo},#{memberId}, SEQ_MATCH_PREDICT.NEXTVAL, #{matchPredictDecision}, SYSDATE)
